#########################################################################
model{
	C <- 100000
	# Truco de los ceros
	for (i in 1:N){
		zy[i] <- 0
		zy[i] ~ dpois(phi[i])
		fy[i] <- (alphaY / sY) * pow(y[i]/sY , -alphaY - 1) * exp(-pow(y[i]/sY , -alphaY))
		phi[i] <- -log(fy[i]) + C
	}
	# Aprioris CO
	alphaY ~  dunif(0,10)
	sY ~ dunif(0,10) 
}

data
list(y=c(19.00, 14.60, 17.70, 12.70, 11.00, 19.70, 18.00, 33.00, 18.50, 19.00, 24.60, 31.30, 28.20, 21.40, 25.50, 17.30, 18.60, 24.30, 21.80, 20.30, 24.10, 24.20, 22.40, 20.70, 27.30, 28.90, 26.20,
